attributes.action: Do Not pass a no confidence motion in government
attributes.additional_details: Passing a no confidence motion by parliament is not what the people of Britain want as proroguing parliament is the only way to deliver Brexit
attributes.background: Continue proroguing parliament so that brexit can be delivered. People have voted for Brexit, so bringing the government down that is delivering brexit is undemocratic.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Political parties can ask their MPs to vote in a particular way on any vote. However, the decision is still made by the individual MPs, rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269917

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269054
